maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig:
\i[arrow-n] Road to \v[area.jungle-city.name]
\i[arrow-s] \v[area.autumn-fall.name]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text:
\i[arrow-n] Route vers le \v[area.jungle-city.name]
\i[arrow-s] \v[area.autumn-fall.name]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well...\. here we are.\. \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon...\. nous y voilà.\. Le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: A lot of new enemy types here.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Ici il y a plein de nouveau types d'ennemis.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Funny enough, though... \c[3]no bugs\c[0].
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Et curieusement... \c[3]pas d'insectes\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You see... Emilie will probably be fine by herself.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu vois... Emilie va probablement bien s'en sortir toute seule.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ... Sorry.\. I should not have said that.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: ... Désolé.\. Je n'aurais pas dû dire ça.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig:
Welcome to the Jungle,
we got cats and plants.
We got everything you want
Seeker, we know the names.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text:
Bienvenue dans la jungle.
Des chats et des plants.
Ici nous en avons tant.
Aucun penchant n'est banni.
On est connu pour ça ici !
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.note: this is somewhat related to a song, which i can't quite translate. But it's unimportant, so why bother.  note: ein Faible = un faible (pour quelque chose)

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Welcome to the Jungle, we got cats and plants. We got everything you want Seeker, we know the names.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bienvenue dans la jungle. On a des chats et des plantes. On a tout ce que vous voulez, \v[lore.title.seeker]. On connait les noms.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I see your stats are still \c[1]way above what would be expected at this point\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je vois que tes stats restent encore \c[1]bien au-dessus de ce qu'elles devraient être à cette étape\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Though the difference clearly isn't as dramatic as it used to be.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bien que la différence ne soit plus aussi dramatique qu'auparavant.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Hm...\. Tes \c[3]stats semblent assez faibles\c[0]. Je te conseille d'améliorer tes \c[3]circuits\c[0] et tes \c[3]équipements\c[0] avant le duel.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Unless you are very confident in your skills. But I don't want to hear any excuses!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Sauf si tu es bien sûre de ce que tu fais. Mais je ne veux pas entendre d'excuses !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I see you are prepared.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je vois que tu t'es préparée.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Are you ready for the duel?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Es-tu prête pour le duel ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Alright then, let's go!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon. Alors, c'est parti !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Hey.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Hé.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Oh, I see. Having business with your girl again?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oh, je vois, tu es encore occupé avec ta gamine ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Joern, you just arrived in time for some glorious Spheromancer action!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Joern, tu arrives juste au bon moment pour admirer un glorieux spectacle plein d'action entre Spheromanceurs !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: We're about to start our third duel!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Nous allons commencer notre troisième duel !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well, whoop-de-doo.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Ouaip, super.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Didn't we want to start exploring Gaia's Garden today?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: On devait pas explorer le \v[area.jungle.name] aujourd'hui ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Yes! Right after the duel! It won't take that long.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui ! Juste après le duel !! Ça ne va pas prendre longtemps.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: It sure won't if she \c[1]beats you up as fast as she did last time\c[0].
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'est sûr, si elle \c[1]te bat aussi rapidement que la dernière fois\c[0]...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Yes, outing her as the \c[1]disgraceful cheater\c[0] she is.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui, ce qui montrera à tout le monde qu'elle n'est une \c[1]ignoble tricheuse\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Fine. I'll be cheering from the side, then.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bien. Moi je vais jouer les supporter sur les côtés.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: By the way, Lea, all by yourself today?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: D'ailleurs, Lea, tu es toute seule aujourd'hui ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I see.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je vois.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well then, let's start!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon alors, commençons !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: PVP Activate!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: PvP Activation !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Today we cross paths for a third time.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Aujourd'hui nos chemins se croisent pour la troisième fois.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Both of us possessing \c[3]Heat\c[0] and \c[3]Cold\c[0].
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Nous deux, possédant les Éléments \c[3]Chaud\c[0] et \c[3]Froid\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Once again it is time for me,\. Apollo,\. to lead you along the right path.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Une fois encore, il est temps pour moi,\. Apollo,\. de te montrer le bon chemin.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig:
The path of a 
proper Spheromancer!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Le chemin d'un véritable Spheromanceur !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: The path... of Justice!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Le chemin... de la Justice !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Let the duel begin!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Que le duel, commence !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [yes]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [oui]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [no]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [non]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse aux Cheveux Bleus !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse aux Cheveux Bleus !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: We finally meet again!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Enfin nous nous rencontrons à nouveau !!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ...Lea.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: ... Lea.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ...Right.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: ... Oui.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Spheromancer Lea! I see you finally reached Gaia's Garden!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse Lea ! Je vois que tu as finalement atteint le \v[area.jungle.name] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Here's hoping that by now you'd have reconsidered your \c[1]disgraceful cheating behavior\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: J'espère que depuis le temps, tu as fini par renoncer à ta \c[1]honteuse tricherie\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: That means we both now possess the \c[3]cold\c[0] and \c[3]heat\c[0] element!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Cela signifie que nous possédons tous les deux les éléments \c[3]chaud\c[0] et \c[3]froid\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: In other words, it is due time...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: En d'autres termes, il est grand temps...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Spheromancer Lea!\. I challenge you to our \c[3]third duel\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse Lea !\. Je te mets au défi de me battre à notre \c[3]troisième duel\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Do you accept?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu acceptes ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Do you...\.\.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu...\.\.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Uhm...\. I mean...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Heu...\. Je veux dire...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Perfect!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Parfait !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I'll be waiting at the \c[3]open field\c[0] down there!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je vais t'attendre juste là, sur la \c[3]grande place\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: That guy again.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Encore ce type.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Don't tell me he has been on a stakeout here all this time...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Ne me dis pas qu'il t'a guetté sur son arbre pendant tout ce temps...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Start the duel with \c[3]Apollo\c[0] in \c[3]Gaia's Garden - Jungle Entrance\c[0]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Démarrez le duel avec \c[3]Apollo\c[0] à l'\c[3]Entrée de la Jungle dans le \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Spheromancer Lea!\. Don't forget about our duel!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse Lea !\. N'oublie pas notre duel !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Spheromancer Lea!\. Don't forget about our duel!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Spheromanceuse Lea !\. N'oublie pas notre duel !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: W-WHAT IS THIS DAMAGE?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C-C'EST QUOI CES DÉGÂTS ?!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: STILL CHEATING?!\. REALLY?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: TOUJOURS EN TRAIN DE TRICHER ?!\. VRAIMENT ?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.note: de is better, but trans would be too long

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well done! Now let's all \c[3]cool down\c[0] again!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bien joué ! Maintenant, allons \c[3]refroidir\c[0] un peu les choses !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: The temperature puns are still not funny.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Les jeux de mots sur la température ne sont toujours pas drôles.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: YOU LEARNED NOTHING!\. ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: TU N'AS RIEN APPRIS !\. STRICTEMENT RIEN APPRIS !!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.note: de: tu n'a vraiment rien, mais vraiment rien appris

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: SUCH AN UTTER DISPLAY OF BLATANT CHEATING!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: QUEL SPECTACLE PATHÉTIQUE DE TRICHERIE INFÂME !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Alright! Let's try something else...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon ! Je vais essayer quelque chose d'autre...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU?!\. DON'T YOU FEEL ASHAMED?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'EST QUOI TON PROBLÈME ?!\. TU N'AS PAS HONTE ?!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Things are getting serious now!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Les choses sérieuses commencent !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: THIS DUEL IS UTTERLY MEANINGLESS!!\. EVEN YOU SHOULD REALIZE THIS!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: CE DUEL N'A STRICTEMENT AUCUN SENS !!\. MÊME TOI TU DEVRAIS T'EN RENDRE COMPTE !!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: This isn't over yet!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Ce n'est pas encore fini !!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Looks like it though.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Pourtant on dirait que si.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Pretty exciting.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'est plutôt amusant.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Dying as quickly as always...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu meurs toujours aussi vite qu'avant...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Down with just a single hit?!\. You should really mind your defensive stats.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: T'es tombée en un coup ?!\. Tu devrais vraiment t'occuper de ta défense.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I won't let you win this easily!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je ne vais pas te laisser gagner aussi facilement !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Was that really all?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'est vraiment tout ce que tu sais faire ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Come on, Lea. Don't give up!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Allez, Lea. N'abandonne pas !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Hein ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You still have much to learn!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu as encore beaucoup à apprendre !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Alright. Time to end this!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon ! Il est temps d'en finir !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: And here I had hoped you'd have learned your lesson.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Et moi qui pensais que tu aurais fini par apprendre ta leçon.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Instead, you keep up this dishonest behavior.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Au lieu de ça, tu restes encore avec ton comportement malhonnête.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I am truly \c[1]disappointed\c[0]. I wish it had been different this time but alas...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je suis \c[1]tristement stupéfait\c[0]. J'esperait vraiment que cette fois-là serait différente, mais hélas...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.note: de: 'j'esperait vraiment que tu reconnaisse  ça, quel fiasco', or something

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ONCE A CHEATER,\. ALWAYS A CHEATER!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: TRICHEUSE UN JOUR,\. TRICHEUSE POUR TOUJOURS !!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I honestly see no reason to place any more hope in you.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je ne vois absolument aucune raison de garder encore de l'espoir pour toi.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You leave me no choice but to report your behavior to the \c[1]moderators\c[0].
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu ne me laisse pas d'autres choix que de devoir signaler ton comportement aux \c[1]modérateurs\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: THIS WAS A DISGUSTING DISPLAY OF CHEATING AND YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELF!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'ÉTAIT UNE HORRIBLE DÉMONSTRATION DE TRICHERIE ET TU DEVRAIS AVOIR HONTE DE TOI !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: YOU ARE A UTTER DISGRACE TO ALL SPHEROMANCERS!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: TU ES VÉRITABLEMENT UNE HONTE POUR TOUS LES SPHEROMANCEURS !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Beaten once again!\. Spheromancer Lea, you are quite the formidable opponent!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Et je suis encore une fois battu !\. Spheromanceuse Lea, tu es quand même un formidable adversaire !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: This time I was defeated. Spheromancer Lea, you've grown immensely!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Cette fois j'ai été vaincu. Spheromanceuse Lea, tu as fait d'énormes progrès !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: It was a good duel, indeed!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'était vraiment un bon duel !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well, it seems at least that you didn't entirely rely on blatant cheating this time.\. I respect this.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon, au moins, cette fois, au moins, tu n'as pas compté uniquement sur de la tricherie honteuse.\. Je respecte ça.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Now there, you used to be more of a challenge, Spheromancer Lea!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Hum, la dernière fois, tu étais clairement bien plus difficile à battre, Spheromanceuse Lea !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: It seems you are still not quite on the right path, Spheromancer Lea.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: On dirait que tu n'es toujours pas vraiment sur la bonne voie, Spheromanceuse Lea.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Still, it was a good duel!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Mais bon, c'était quand même un bon duel !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ...Bye.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: ... Bye.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Hey, Lea, is everything alright with you?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Hé, Lea, est-ce que tout va bien pour toi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You really seem quite...\. \c[1]sad\c[0]...\. especially considering how you just beat up Polly in that duel.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu m'as l'air d'être assez... \c[1]triste\c[0]...\. surtout quand on sait comment tu as battu Polly dans ce duel.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You're all by yourself...\. and honestly don't look that happy to me.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu es toute seule aujourd'hui...\. et tu me donnes pas l'impression d'être heureuse.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Hm.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Mmm.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: She really doesn't talk much, does she?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Elle ne parle vraiment pas beaucoup, non ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Yeah, she is fairly shy.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui, elle est assez timide.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Is she, now?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce qu'elle l'est vraiment ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Lea, can you say "Apollo" for me?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Lea, est-ce que tu peux dire "Apollo" pour moi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: You can't say it, can you?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu ne peux pas le dire, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Wh...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Qu...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Do you have issues with your speech module?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu as un problème avec ton module vocal ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: All the time?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Depuis le début ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: How is that even still a thing these days?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Comment ça se fait que ça puisse encore arriver ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Poor little thing.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: La pauvre fille.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well... Here's an idea, Lea.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon... j'ai une idée, Lea.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Since you're by yourself...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Vu que tu es toute seule...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Do you want to explore the jungle \c[3]together with us\c[0]?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu voudrais pas explorer la jungle \c[3]avec nous\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: W-What?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Q-Quoi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ...Why?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: JOERN,\. WHAT ARE YOU SAYING?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: JŒRN,\. QU'EST-CE QUE TU RACONTES ?!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: DIDN'T YOU WITNESS WHAT JUST HAPPENED?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: TU N'AS PAS VU CE QU'ELLE VIENT DE FAIRE ?!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: WHY ON SHADOON SHOULD WE TEAM UP WITH A \c[1]SERIAL CHEATER\c[0] LIKE HER?!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: POURQUOI ON IRAIT FAIRE QUELQUE CHOSE AVEC UNE \c[1]TRICHEUSE EN SÉRIE\c[0] COMME ELLE ?!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Polly,\. did it ever occur to you that her cheating may not be entirely deliberate?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Polly,\. est-ce que ça ne t'est jamais venu à l'idée que peut être elle ne triche pas complètement délibérément ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What?\. How could that be?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Quoi ?\. Comment ça serait possible ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Who knows? Maybe it's an unintentional bug and she just rolled with it.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Qui sait ? Peut-être que c'est un bug involontaire et qu'elle peut plus s'en débarrasser.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: She might very well regret it by now, but probably has no way to disable it.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Elle le regrette peut-être déjà, mais n'a probablement aucun moyen de le désactiver.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I mean...\. just look at her.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je veux dire...\. regarde là.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Is this what a malicious cheater looks like to you?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce qu'elle ressemble à une tricheuse sournoise pour toi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What are you saying, Joern?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce que tu racontes, Joern ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Polly, just look at her.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Polly, regarde là.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: She seems so miserable being alone like this.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Elle a l'air vraiment déprimée en étant toute seule comme ça.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Don't you feel sorry for her?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu n'es pas désolé pour elle ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well... kinda...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui bon... un peu...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: ALRIGHT FINE!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'EST BON, ÇA VA !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I don't mind her joining us, if you're fine with it, Joern.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Si c'est bon pour toi, Joern, alors pas de soucis pour moi.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well then.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bon alors.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What do you say, Lea? Shall we travel together?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce que tu en dis, Lea ? Est-ce que tu veux venir avec nous ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Good!\. Let's create a party, then.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Bien !\. Alors formons un groupe.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Joern
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Joern

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Apollo
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Apollo

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What is even happening...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce qu'on est en train de faire...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Shouldn't you be happy?\. We have a party with two Spheromancers now.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu devrais pas être heureux ?\. On a un groupe avec deux Spheromanceurs maintenant.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Right, now that you mention it!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui, maintenant que tu le dis !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Two \c[3]Spheromancers\c[0] and a \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0], quite the noble party indeed!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Deux \c[3]Spheromanceurs\c[0] et un \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0], c'est un noble groupe que nous avons là !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: There you go.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Et voilà.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: So...\. what's next?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Sinon...\. C'est quoi la suite ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Let's see...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Voyons voir...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Our noble band just entered the realm of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Notre noble troupe vient juste d'entrer dans le royaume de \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Indeed! What else is there to do than seek the human settlement hidden within this wilderness!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui ! Qu'il y a-t-il d'autre à faire que de chercher la colonie humaine cachée dans cette jungle sauvage !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Le \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: The towering fortress of the jungle!\. This shall be our destination!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: La forteresse surplombant la jungle !\. Voilà notre destination !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I see.\. Let's go, Lea!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je vois.\. Allons-y, Lea !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Explore \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] together with Apollo and Joern. Your next destination is \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Explorez le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] avec Apollo et Joern. Votre prochaine destination est le \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Forget it!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oublie ça !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I won't fall for that!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu m'auras pas comme ça !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I got you now!!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: C'est moi qui t'aies eu là !!

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Still falling for the same trick.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu tombes toujours dans mon piège.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Really now, I expected better.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Sérieusement, je m'attendais à mieux.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: So...\. shall we go, then?\. The jungle is waiting!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Donc...\. on peut y aller ?\. La jungle nous attend !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: I don't know...\. I don't really feel like it.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Je sais pas...\. Ça me dit rien.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Is everything ok?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tout va bien ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Not sure...\. maybe we just played for a bit too long.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Aucune idée...\. Peut-être que l'on a joué pendant trop longtemps.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Finally, we have proper trees in this game!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: On a enfin des vrais arbres dans ce jeu !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Didn't we have trees in the other areas as well?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Il y avait pas déjà des arbres dans les autres régions ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Pfff! You mean those oversized bushes? Barely trees, really.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Pfff ! Tu veux dire ces buissons grossis à la loupe ? C'est à peine des arbres, sérieusement...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: What does it matter, anyway? We can't even climb.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Quelle importance ? On ne peut même pas grimper dessus.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Phew... they even support the perception of humid weather.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Pfiou... Ils ont même ajouté la perception de l'humidité.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Just turn it down.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Tu n'as qu'à la diminuer.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Nope I'm fine! Just give me a little time to get used to it.
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Non, non, je vais bien ! Laisse-moi juste un peu de temps pour que je m'y habitue.

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Madam gotta have her immersion...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Madame veut son immersion...

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Did you notice too how during the quest they refered to the hologram frobbit as a rodent?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu as remarqué comment durant la quête, ils ont dit rongeur pour parler du grelapin hologramme ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Hmmm...\. no, not really.\. Why?
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Mmmm...\. non, pas vraiment.\. Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Rabbits are not rodents!\. They are lagomorphs!
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Les lapins ne sont pas des rongeurs !\. Ce sont des lagomorphes !

maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.orig: Well, technically a frobbit is half frog and half rabbit, so...
maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.json/entiti.text: Oui bon, techniquement un grelapin est moitié lapin moitié grenouille, donc...
